ComicInfo.Title: Thor Croaks
ComicInfo.Summary: Thor Croaks: Asgard is holding the Althing to determine who will be her next ruler, but where is the mighty Thor? Thanks to a spell by Loki, Thor is a frog living in Central Park who joins more of his kind in a battle with some sinister rats. Hildy finds the sword of Surtur.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:31:11. [Issue ID 41125]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Harokin (guest),Asgard Kids [Hildy] (guest),Piper (villain),Volstagg] (guests),and other frogs (introductions),Toothgnasher (guest),Loki (villain),Thor (feature, as a frog),Sif (guest),Greensong (introduction),Toothgrinder (guest),Beta Ray Bill (guest),Frigga (guest),King Glugwort (introduction, death),Jarvis (guest),Franklin Richards (guest),Warriors Three [Hogun,Puddlegulp (introduction),Ratso (villain),Gullywhump (introduction),Fandral,Bugeye (introduction),Southside (villain),Dewlap (introduction),and other rats (villains, 1st),Grand Thane (guest),Heimdall (guest)
